divs: sighting detailsdriving down 108th to 109th near pullman, michigan witnessed bright lights in western sky (over lake michigan) moving fast north east. 3 lights very bright, moving faster than any jet we've ever seen and making quick zig zag turns then hoovering north of 108th way up in sky but remaining extremely bright. this occured lated around 10 p.m. watched the bright lights for at least 5 minutes all the way to 109th\i96 n. this was not an airplane and no helicopter could move this quickly and 3 bright lights entire time.
Summary: 3 bright lights, moving very fast, changing direction fast & hoovering, remaining very bright after long passed
